Playing X-men: Mutant Academy

Achievements.Title: Mortimer Toynbee
Achievements.Description: Finish all lessons in academy training as Toad.
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: Psychotic Hunter
Achievements.Description: Finish both rounds as Sabretooth using the Arrow Special in arcade mode. (Medium+)
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: Magnetism
Achievements.Description: Perform the combo [X, Circle, Magnetic Lift] 4 hits, then finish using the Arrow Special as Magneto in arcade or survival mode. (Medium+)
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: Scott Summers
Achievements.Description: Finish all lessons in academy training as Cyclops.
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: Logan
Achievements.Description: Finish all lessons in academy training as Wolverine.

Achievements.Description: Finish all lessons in academy training as Storm.

Achievements.Description: Finish all lessons in academy training as Beast.

Achievements.Description: Finish all lessons in academy training as Phoenix.

Achievements.Title: Shape-shift
Achievements.Description: Perform 20 hits as Mystique in arcade or survival mode. (Medium+)

Achievements.Description: Finish all lessons in academy training as Mystique.

Achievements.Title: X-men 2000
Achievements.Description: Finish arcade mode using any movie costume. (Medium+)
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: X-cellent
Achievements.Description: Win a perfect round in arcade or survival mode. (Medium+)
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: Maximum Damage
Achievements.Description: Perform and hit any special with x5 damage improvement in arcade or survival mode.
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: X-treme
Achievements.Description: Finish arcade mode in Expert difficulty.
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: X-pert
Achievements.Description: Win 15 rounds in survival mode. (Medium+)
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Description: Finish arcade mode as Magneto. (Medium+)

Achievements.Title: Optic Blast
Achievements.Description: Perform at least 30 hits [Square, Triangle, S Special and X Special] as Cyclops in arcade or survival mode. (Medium+)
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: Ferocious
Achievements.Description: Perform 22 hits [S Special, X, Circle, Circle, Arrow Special] as Wolverine in arcade or survival mode. (Medium+)
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: Pick a card
Achievements.Description: Perform the combo [2 hits, Staff Charge Upper, X Special] as Gambit in arcade or survival mode. (Medium+)
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: Maelstrom
Achievements.Description: Finish each round as Storm in arcade mode using Arrow and X specials, or vice versa. (Medium+)
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: Genius-Level intellect
Achievements.Description: Finish each round as Beast in arcade mode using any different special. (Medium+)
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: Telepathy
Achievements.Description: Finish each round as Phoenix in arcade mode using any different special. (Medium+)
Achievements.Author: raniejogos

Achievements.Title: Goo
Achievements.Description: Perform the combo [Circle, Circle, Arrow Special, Flytrap] as Toad in arcade or survival mode. (Medium+)
Achievements.Author: raniejogos
